summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Center Parking Strip in 43rd Avenue Northeast, from East 38th Street to East 45th Street; by seeding; planting and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 11883 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
